pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, February 2, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, February 2, 2018:

Nanaimo, British Columbia

Note: All times local

11 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall Q&A.

Vancouver Island University Gymnasium
900 Fifth Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive at the west gym doors no later than 10 a.m.‎

Media appearances

7:10 a.m. – A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on On the Island, CBC Radio One.
